attributes.action: To stop companies charging fees for paying with a debit or credit card when the only option is to pay with one of these!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are some companies that charge customers a 'card paying fee' or 'handling fee' for paying with a credit or debit card and there is no alternative method of payment!
The idea is clearly a rip off and needs to be fully investigated
